about.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral,
platform-neutral, extensible mechanism for serializing structured data-
think XML, but smaller, faster, and simpler.
about.summary: Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format. C++ Libraries and protoc, the protobuf compiler.

name: libprotobuf-static
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: libprotobuf-static
  version: 3.17.2
source:
  - patches:
      - 0001-remove-Werror-from-test-flags.patch
    sha256: 36f81e03a0702f8f935fffd5a486dac1c0fc6d4bae1cd02c7a32448ad6e63bcb
    url: https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/archive/v3.17.2/libprotobuf-v3.17.2.tar.gz
  - folder: third_party/benchmark
    sha256: 5dc92703f811f94e2aa63bdab07ab749f28a094befa6cdfd5fe177f947590a48
    url: https://github.com/google/benchmark/archive/5b7683f49e1e9223cf9927b24f6fd3d6bd82e3f8.tar.gz
  - folder: third_party/googletest
    sha256: 0e2f36e8e403c125fd0ab02171bdb786d3b6b3875b6ccf3b2eb7969be8faecd0
    url: https://github.com/google/googletest/archive/5ec7f0c4a113e2f18ac2c6cc7df51ad6afc24081.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '1'
  script: build_static.sh
  string: h690f14c_1
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
    - autoconf 2.69 pl5320h36c2ea0_10
    - automake 1.16.2 pl5320ha770c72_3
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.36.1 h193b22a_1
    - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.36.1 h17f093b_1
    - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.36 h5e27e69_32
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 9.3.0 h70c0ae5_19
    - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 hb01a033_19
    - gcc_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 h2bf1170_32
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 9.3.0 hd87eabc_19
    - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 h3f889d9_19
    - gxx_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 hdbba41e_32
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 h77966d4_13
    - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 hbe0c576_10
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.36.1 hea4e1c9_1
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.36.1 h8031a8f_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 9.3.0 h7864c58_19
    - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 ha51107c_19
    - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h2828fa1_19
    - libgomp 9.3.0 h2828fa1_19
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 9.3.0 hb016644_19
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-ppc64le 9.3.0 h4e898c6_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h6de172a_19
    - libtool 2.4.6 h58526e2_1007
    - m4 1.4.18 h516909a_1001
    - make 4.3 hd18ef5c_1
    - perl 5.32.1 0_h7f98852_perl5
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 h36c2ea0_1008
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 h77966d4_13
    - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h8b29623_10
    - unzip 6.0 h7f98852_2
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hc7a5eb4_18
    - libgomp 9.3.0 hc7a5eb4_18
    - libprotobuf 3.17.2 h690f14c_1
    - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h22bc1b8_18
    - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1010
  run:
    - libgcc-ng >=9.3.0
    - libprotobuf 3.17.2 h690f14c_1
    - libstdcxx-ng >=9.3.0
    - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
    - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotobuf.a
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotobuf-lite.a
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotoc.a
about:
  description: 'Protocol buffers are Google''s language-neutral,

    platform-neutral, extensible mechanism for serializing structured data-

    think XML, but smaller, faster, and simpler.

    '
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/releases
  doc_url: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
  home: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format. C++ Libraries and
    protoc, the protobuf compiler.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dopplershift
    - hajapy
    - jakirkham
    - ocefpaf
    - wesm
    - xhochy

Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral,

think XML, but smaller, faster, and simpler.
